nodes.text: The MK I "Hotspot" insulated armor was a type of insulated clone trooper armor utilized by the clone flametrooper corps of the Grand Army of the Galactic Republic during the Clone Wars against the Confederacy of Independent Systems. The suit was severely flawed in that it did not have sufficient respirator filtration, so the Flame trooper corps switched to MK II "Hotspot" Insulated Armor.

The MK I "Hotspot" insulated armor was mentioned in Rise of the Separatists, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
